string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: Add your EU digital COVID certificates to the application. In this way, you will be able to prove that you meet the PCT conditions using the application.
You can now add digital COVID certificates of family members in the app.
You can now verify the validity of certificates for a selected country before you travel.

\#OstaniZdrav offers you to check-in at events. Event organizers and store owners can generate a QR code with the app. Visitors can then scan this QR code upon arrival and save a check-in in the app. The application can also create an entry in contact journal on request. If someone who attends this event is later diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2, others who were present at the event at the same time may be alerted.

For quick access to the QR code scanner, it has been added to the toolbar. With it, you can scan a QR code at an event or a COVID certificate. It also allows you to import QR codes from a file or photo.

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: EU digital COVID certificates
Family Certificates
EU Certificate Validation
Check-in at events
QR code Scanner

string-array.name: submission_done_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: The duration of isolation is at the discretion of your treating physician.
In case of worsening of the disease, consult your chosen personal or on-duty doctor by phone. In an emergency, call 112. Inform them that you have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2.
Exposure logging has stopped because you have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2 infection. When the isolation is finished, press the Reactivate button and the exposure log will be activated.

string-array.name: submission_intro_bullet_points
string-array.item: If you have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2 infection, you can inform others by entering the TAN code. You received the TAN code via SMS.
If you have not yet received the TAN code or it has expired, you can obtain it via the online form in the next step.

string-array.name: submission_symptom_symptom_bullets
string-array.item: Feeling unwell
Cold signs
Cough
Fever
Shortness of breath
Headache
Muscle pains
Loss of smell ortaste
Sore throat

string-array.name: test_result_card_negative_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: Still feeling unwell? If you feel very poorly and/or your symptoms have worsened, please contact your general practitioner.
Remain at home until you feel well again. If you were to get infected with coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) whilst weakened from another infection, this could lead to a serious illness.
Do not go to work if you feel unwell to ensure you do not put other people at risk.
If your symptoms worsen, you might need another SARS-CoV-2 test.
